response.job_title: Chemical Engineer | Formulation | Projects | Quality analysis | BPM | HACCP | ISO9001| Security and stability | Regulation
response.summary: Chemical engineer, specialist in Cosmetic Science and Technology, with experience in quality analysis, project management, design, formulation and regulation of cosmetic and cleaning products. Knowledge in GMP, HACCP analysis, stability and safety studies. Professional with great communication skills, teamwork, detail orientation, goal achievement and continuous improvement.
response.skills: Ingeniería, Control de calidad, BPM, Validación de procesos, Tratamiento de aguas, Trabajo en equipo, Análisis de peligros y puntos de control críticos, Capacidad de análisis, Bpm, Ingeniería de proyectos, Buenas prácticas (GxP), Elaboración de presupuestos, Investigación, Estudios de estabilidad, Asuntos normativos, Calidad de producto, Investigación y desarrollo (I+D), Aseo, Cosméticos, Formulación

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the design, execution and supervision of thermal projects; basic and detailed engineering designs; support for budgeting; logistics planning of equipment imports.
profile_positions.title: Project engineer

profile_positions.description: Responsible for research for the improvement of the products through the management of reagents and laboratory equipment; support in the development of quality analysis; improvement of quality reporting and analysis procedures.
profile_positions.title: Quality control intern
